transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Ji.
Ji, aap Vijay Agrawal se baat kar rahe ho?
Ji.
Achha, mai Vijay Agrawal bol raha tha IndiaMART se sir.
Ji boliye.
Bas badhiya, bas mai ek to ye keh raha tha ki wo bhaiya ke paas na call aaya tha IndiaMART se.
Hello?
Han boliye.
Mai keh raha hu ji bhaiya ke paas call aaya tha IndiaMART se na, wo hosting ke jo aapne Maximizer ka liya tha na aapne payment kiya tha Maximizer ka.
Kya kya cheez ka? Domain wala.
Aap logo ne jo abhi liya hai na plan domain wala.
Han.
To uski hosting ke liye jo aapki email ID hai na.
Achha.
Usse mail gaya hai.
Hosting ke liye.
Malum nahi sir, hame aapko thoda baad me call karu, mai kaam me hu.
Wo Sabir ji kaha hai?
Wo to mai bahar hu market par hu, wo ghar pe honge shayad.
Achha, maine call kiya tha uthaye nahi call unhone bhi abhi.
Mai pata karta hu han.
Thik, thik hai.
Thik hai. Han udhar bhai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called regarding hosting for domain plan.

- Customer is currently busy with work.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about the hosting email.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- hosting, domain, email, maximizer
